thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 14 of 99
thread.title: Zak

author: Zak
title: Zak
text: I'm from Australia and i bought a belt and handbag from Ssense. I could not believe how fast my goods had arrived. I think from purchase to delivery was 4 days. The 2 items arrived separately wich i didn't expect and the parcel was labelled as 1 of 1. The only thing I would would probably change is if there are 2 parcels mark them as 1 of 2 and 2 of 2 or perhaps provide 2 seperate order numbers. Otherwise I would highly recommend shopping with Ssense my goods were well wrapped, in excellent condition and delivered in less than a week.
